instructions: Add ingredients to blender twister jar.  Blend medium to medium high speed for 40 seconds
Combine and mix tuna, mayo, salsa in bowl
Put mixture onto half of tortilla.  Put cheese on top of tuna
Fold in half, melt on press/grill
Finely chop lettuce.  Add to bowl and mix with salad dressing
Place cheese on flatbread.  Place turkey on cheese.  Place lettuce on turkey
Fold in half and grill/press
Brush bread with some oil and toast.  Optional, brush with garlic.
Add avocado
Slice and add pickle
Add roasted red peppers
Heat oil in pan and fry/steam carrots to soften.
Shred up roast beef slices, add to carrots, continue to fry to soften the beef.
Add soy sauce and sesame seeds.
Add to lettuce wraps

name: Chili Beef/Pork Lettuce Wraps

ingredients: Ground Pork (can be half pork and half beef)
instructions: Season ground meat.  Add oil to very hot pan and fry meat dark brown and crispy.  Break up with spoon.
Remove and drain off oil through sive.  Wipe out pan.
Add 1tsp sesame oil, chili, ginger, garlic to pan.
Add brown sugar, add back in meat.  Add fish sauce.
Add zest of lime and lime juice.  Add spring onions.
Dipping sauce - 1tsp brown sugar, soy sauce, 1Tbsp sesame oil, 1Tbsp olive oil, 1tsp fish sauce, lime juice
Add diced chili (keep seeds in).  Add diced cilantro

notes: This is awesome!  Maybe a little too intense, don't go crazy on brown sugar.

instructions: Heat oil in a wok, add scallions, ginger and garlic
Add carrots (shredded), cabbage and peppers, wilt down
Push to side of wok, add ground pork and fry it for color
Bring together.  Add soy sauce, sesame oil, oyster sauce, sugar for flavor
Add to egg roll wrapper, wrap it up
Heat oil in wok and fry it to finish
Cook Pasta, drain, set aside
Heat oil in wok, add pork strips, get color on strips; remove pork strips
Add ginger and garlic to oil.  Cook for a bit.  Add carrot, yellow onion, peppers, cook
Add back in pork strips, add sesame oil, add scallions, add sugar and soy sauce
drop in noodles, mix and serve
Whisk soy sauce, cornstarch, oyester sauce and cooking wine to make a sauce
Marinade meat in soy sauce and sesame oil
Add water to wok, add broccoli and salt.  Slightly steam broccoli until water is gone
Clear Wok, add oil and beef for color.  Remove beef
Add oil, scallions, ginger and garlic, cook
Add back in broccoli, heat for a bit, add back in beef.  Add sauce, as it heats it will thicken.
Add sesame seeds

ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, bite sized pieces
instructions: Beat egg, add soy sauce, cornstarch, wine, baking powder.  Mix together.
Add chicken thighs.  Marinade for a few hours
In a clean bowl, add baking powder and cornstarch
In another bowl, mix soy sauce, wine, rice vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, chili flakes
Drege chicken through powder bowl and deep fry it 350-370 degrees
In a wok, heat oil and fry scallions, ginger and garlic
Add sauce, let thicken, add chicken, coat with sauce
Add sesame seeds, serve over rice
Season chicken with salt, pepper and oil.  Broil until golden.  Deglaze with beer.
Dice onion, green bell pepper, and celery.  Mince jalapeno.  Can use food processor.  Mince garlic

In a large pot, add sausage and brown.  Remove sausage and add 1/3 cup oil to the fat.  Add 4 tablespoons butter.  Add 1/3 cup flour to make a roux.  Keep whisking and cook until dark.  Go low and slow.  Takes about 30 minutes.
Add onions, cook 5 minutes.  Add peppers and celery.  Five more minutes. Add garlic.  Cook for another minute.
Add 1 cup of beer, cook off alcohol

Add 1 quart stock.  Add creole seasoning.  Stir while adding.  Add in chicken and fond.  Add 5 bay leaves, thyme.  Add salt.  About 1 tablespoon (less if using creole seasoning).  Add about 1 tsp of black pepper.  Add some cayenne pepper.
Add sausage.  Let it simmer for 3 hours, stir every 30 minutes.  Skim off fat during simmer.
Take out bay leaves, add green onions.
Add shrimp, cook for 7 minutes (optional)
Serve over rice

name: Spinach Curry

ingredients: ghee, corriander seeds, cardamon pods, cumin seeds, garam masala
instructions: Heat ghee, add whole corriander seeds, cardamon pods, cumin seeds
Add fresh chilis, onion and salt.  Cook down
Add ginger garlic paste
Add two bags of spinach, add some water and simmer
Add salt and garam masala
(Optional) Add channa dal or lentils.  Add more water
Let it cook for 30 minutes

notes: Way too many spices.  Skip salt or garam masala, or take it easy.  Also, whole spices were annoying to eat around.  Remove them after step 1 probably.

instructions: In a large skillet.  Heat coconut oil.  Add corriander, fenugreek, cinnamon sticks, mustard seeds, dried chilis.  Heat until seeds start to pop.
Add onions. Heat until brown.  Add ginger garlic paste.  Heat for another minute.
Add chopped butternut squash.  Cook for a few minutes
Add coconut milk.  Add turmeric
Add mushrooms, add lime juice
Cover and cook for a few more minutes
Poke holes into eggplants, wrape in foil, put into 400F oven for about 90 minutes
In a pot or dutch over, heat ghee and add cardamon pods, cumin seeds, green peppercorn (or black), fresh diced chilis.
Add diced onion and salt, cook for a few minutes
Add ginger garlic paste, cook one minute
Add 2 cans diced tomatoes.  Cook down for 10 minutes.
Scoup out eggplant meat, discard skins.  Add meat to tomato sauce
Add chopped cilantro

ingredients: garlic: 3 cloves minced for sauce, 3 cloves minced for kale
instructions: Preheat oven to 450F
In small saucepan, add 3/4 cup ketchup, 2 Tbsp honey, 2 Tbsp soy sauce, 3 Tbsp Worchestshire sauce.  Mix and simmer for 2-5 minutes to reduce to glaze.
In a bowl, combine 1 pound ground chicken, 3 cloves garlic, 2 sliced green onions, 1 beaten egg.  Season with salt and pepper and mix with hands.
Form into about 12 balls.  Place onto parchment paper.  Put into oven 15 minutes or until done.
Heat oil in very hot pan, place in kale to get slight char on both sides.
Add 3 cloves garlic and salt to kale.  Add lemon/lime juice.  Stir and place into bowl.
After 15 minutes, remove meatballs from oven, brush with sauce glaze.  Put back into oven under broiler for a couple minutes
Serve meatballs over yogurt on plate as garnish with kale

name: Peanutty Pork Stir Fry

ingredients: pork chops (1 pound); cubed (I had a package of 1.5 pounds and it work great)
instructions: Mix stir fry sauce: 2 Tbsp soy sauce, 2Tbsp rice vinegar, 1tsp sugar, 5 cloves grated garlic, 2 knobs grated ginger (or ginger garlic paste), 2.5tsp corn starch
1 pound pork chops, cut into cubes.  Fry in skillet/wok with neutral oil until brown.  Remove from pan
Dice six (6) celery ribs, one bunch scallions, one fresno/serrano chili (finely diced), 1 onion.  Add to skillet and constantly stir and heat until soft.
Re-add pork to skillet and heat.  Add in stir fry sauce and heat until thickened.
Chop and add peanuts and mix.  Serve over rice

notes: This was great!  1/4 cup soy sauce and two chilis made it too intense.  I trimmed the fat from the pork chops and fried it up first.  This rendered out the fat and eliminated the need to add oil to the pan.  make again with 2 Tbsp soy sauce and one chili.  Was too weak.  Maybe 2 Tbsp + 2 chilis for just right?

instructions: Roll out dough into discs.  In a cast iron pan, cook dry on one side for 3 minutes on medium heat.
Brush top with ghee, wait for bubbles.  Flip and cook for two minutes on the other side
Place 1 cup of basmati rice into a small sauce pan.  Wash and drain the rice a couple of times to get rid of the excess starch
Toast the rice for a couple of minutes on medium high heat.  Then, add in 1 cup of coconut milk
When the milk starts to bubble, give the rice a good stir to make sure nothing is grabbing the bottom of the pan.  Then, cover and cook on medium low for 15min
Dice the red onion, coarsely chop the peanuts, and chop the broccolini
After 15min, turn the heat off and let the rice steam further for 10min
Heat up a non stick pan on medium heat.  Add the coconut oil
Add the red onion and chickpeas followed by the garlic powder, chili powder, smoked paprika, turmeric, and salt
Add in the hazelnuts and broccolini
Sauté for 3-4min
Add the shredded coconut.  Sauté for another couple of minutes and taste and adjust the seasoning if needed
Plate the rice and add the coconut chickpeas on top.  Garnish with some freshly chopped cilantro

name: Breakfast Casserole

ingredients: 3/4 pound uncooked sausage, casings removed (You can use ground turkey, ground beef or ground chicken instead)
optional: 1 teaspoon dried rosemary to give the sausage more flavor
2 bell peppers, diced (any color you prefer; about 2 cups)
salt and fresh ground black pepper
4 slices day-old bread (gluten free, whole wheat, white, sourdough, any kind you like)
1/2 cup milk (I use almond milk, any milk works) (Mom used a can of coconut milk)
1/2 cup shredded cheese - any works - pepper jack, mozzarella, gouda, swiss, cheddar
instructions: Set a large skillet over medium heat and coat it with nonstick spray or a drizzle of olive oil. Place sausage in the skillet and begin to break it up with a spatula or fork. Stir in the rosemary and brown the sausage, about 6-7 minutes.

Meanwhile, set a 2nd skillet over medium heat and coat it with nonstick spray or a drizzle of olive oil. (If you have a skillet large enough to fit both the sausage and veggies, you can just add the veggies to the sausage that is browning in step 1.) Add the peppers, mushrooms, spinach, onion, garlic, and a sprinkle each of salt and pepper. Begin stirring and cooking the veggies down until tender, about 6-8 minutes.
Set sausage and veggies aside.
Generously grease a 9×13 baking pan. Break the bread into pieces and place in the pan in an even layer.

In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, and 1/4 cup shredded cheese together. Pour half of this egg mixture over the bread. Top with the sausage and vegetables, then the remaining egg mixture and remaining 1/4 cup cheese. Add a sprinkle of salt and pepper on top.
Cover casserole with plastic wrap or aluminum foil and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight– or up to 1 day. Allow it to come to room temperature before baking.

Preheat the oven to 375°F (191°C). Bake the casserole, uncovered, until the top is golden, edges are crisp, and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean– about 40-45 minutes. I like mine on the super crisp side, so I bake it for around 45-50 minutes. Allow to cool for 10 minutes, then slice and serve. Tastes awesome with hot sauce on top.
Leftovers keep well in the refrigerator for up to 5 days. Reheat in the microwave to your liking.

notes: Mom made this for Owen's baptism.  It was great!

name: Chicken / Turkey Wraps
notes: Great for leftover chicken or turkey

name: Thick Hot Chocolate
notes: I didn't measure the milk, probably added closer to two cups, and it was still too thick.  1 Tbsp cornstarch was too much.  It was also very sweet (used 72% chocolate).  Probably reduce sugar from 2 Tbsp.
Reduced corstarch and sugar, was better.  maybe reduced cornstarch and sugar too much.  2tsp cornstarch and 4tsp sugar?
Tried with almond milk and no chocolate bar, total failure

instructions: Add dark chocolate, sugar, cocoa powder and splash of milk to a small saucepan on medium heat.  Stir until melted.
Add in a cup of milk.
In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch and splash of milk to make a slurry.  Add slurry to melted chocolate slowly while stirring.  Stir and heat until thickened.

versions.name: 8 servings
instructions: Stovetop: Combine into large pot, heat and stir until chocolate chips are melted, turn heat to low.
Slow cooker: combine and cook on low for 2-3 hours, stir every 15-20 minutes
Serve with dusting of cocoa powder and cinnamon stick

versions.name: Double Serving
ingredients: 1 ounce chocolate chips (bittersweet, or sweet and reduce sugar)
instructions: Medium heat until melted, stir, divide into 2 mugs.

name: Faux Wendy's Spicy Chicken Sandwich
notes: This is great, but deep frying is kind of a pain.  Maybe half deep fry?  Added pickeled jalapenos because we had them and they were awesome

ingredients: flour, cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, vegetable oil
instructions: Pound Chicken breasts flat
In a bowl, whisk an egg and hot sauce.
In a second bowl, add flour and cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper and salt.
Dredge chicken through dry bowl, then wet bowl, then dry again. Freeze chicken if possible.
In a small skillet, heat vegetable oil on medium.  Use enough vegetable oil to almost submerge breasts.  Fry for 3-4 minutes per side.  After pulling out, add salt to fried chicken
Serve on toasted buns with mayo, lettuce and tomato

ingredients: Tough meat cut: beef or lamb
instructions: Preheat oven to 350F
Bring meat up to room temperature, season with salt and pepper, fry in a dutch oven to get it charred on all sides
Remove meat, add carrots, onions and celery.  Let cook until carmelized
Add red wine to pot to deglaze.  Let alcohol cook off.
Add water halfway up the pot and bring to a boil
Lower to a simmer, add aromatics and cover.  Move to oven.  Cook for 1-2 hours depending on how much meat you have.  Pull out when tender.

name: Spicy Chili Oil
notes: Good to use up leftover chicken fat

instructions: Heat up chicken fat until completely liquified.
In another bowl, add other ingredients, slowly pour liquid chicken into bowl.  Whisk together.
Cut cucumber into pieces.  Smash them up to help them absorb other incredients.
Mix it all together.  Season with salt

ingredients: corriander seeds, cumin seeds, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, butter, paprika, kashmiri chili powder

versions.name: Curry Paste
instructions: Toast in a dry pan: 1 Tbsp corriander seeds, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds for a couple minutes, remove from heat and add to bowl.  Add to a blender and break apart the spices.
Add to blender 7 cloves garlic, 2" knob ginger, 1 Tbsp garam masala, 1 tsp turmeric, 2 chilis de-stemmed, 1/4 cup water. blend it until smooth
Add to blender 2 Tbsp canola oil, keep blending until smooth.

versions.name: Chicken Marinade
instructions: Add to a bowl 1 cup plain whole milk yogurt, two Tbsp curry paste, 2tsp kosher salt, whisk together.
Cut 2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs into bite sized pieces.  Add to bowl with marinade, cover and put in fridge for 30 minutes to overnight.

versions.name: Rice
instructions: In pressure cooker, 1 to 1 ratio of washed basmati rice and water with some cardamon pods.  Cook 6 minutes, natural release about 8 minutes.

versions.name: Curry
instructions: Blend 28 oz can whole tomatoes, set aside
In saute pan, heat oil and seer chicken on all sides.  Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
Reduce heat in pan and add 4 Tbsp butter.  Add one diced onion. Cook five minutes
Add all remaining curry paste, add 1 Tbsp paprika, 1 tsp kashmiri chili powder, heat another minute
Add pureed tomatoes. Simmer 10 minutes.
(Optional).  Wait to cool and blend mixture for smoother texture.
Add 1 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, mix.  Re-add chicken.  Simmer 10 more minutes, serve over rice.  Garnish with cilantro

name: Gordon Ramsay Easy Curry in a hurry

ingredients: chicken (breast or thighs), diced into bite sized pieces
curry powder or garam masala, 1 Tbsp
instructions: In a non-stick pan, add oil and grated butternut squash, salt and curry powder.
Grate the red onion, add to pan, season with more salt and stir
Dice chilis, add to pan.
Microplane grate ginger into pan. (or use paste), stir
Create hole in center of pan, add raw chicken, season with salt, mix into pan
Add peas, add chopped tomatoes, stir.
Add coconut milk, mix
Add broth to loosen curry (water is OK too).  Taste for seasoning.  Let cook for about 6 minutes to let chicken cook.
Add spinach last minute

versions.name: Roti bread
instructions: Mix 1/2 cup flour, pinch of salt, glug of olive oil, 1/2 cup water in a bowl into a dough bowl.  Let rest for 15 minutes.
Cut into four parts, roll each part into flatbread.  In a clean non-stick pan, add pinch of salt, splash of oil, add flatbread, let it bubble up and turn over.
Slice bread into pieces for dipping.
Heat vegetable oil and sugar, stirring constantly until sugar is light brown, about 10 minutes.  Mixture will be very hot.
Add diced onions.  Stir constantly for about 15 minutes.
Pour red wine vinegar and let simmer until consistency is jam like, about 30 minutes

ingredients: 1 pound uncooked pasta, cooked according to package directions
instructions: Cook pasta
Cook onions in a separate bowl
Add basic, black pepper, water and bouillon.  Simmer 10 minutes
Combine pasta and onion mixture.  Sprinkle with cheese.

name: French Onion Soup
notes: It's good, but I think the broth was way fancier than required.  Plain beef stock would have probably been 95% as good.  Also, I bought a brick of gruyere for this.  It would probably be just as good with any other cheese.

ingredients: 1 cup alcohol (dry sherry or red wine for this recipe beef broth, white white for chicken stock)
Shredded cheese topping: Gruyere or any other cheese

versions.name: Soup
instructions: Thinly slice onions.  Heat until bottom of pot is golden brown.
Add 2 Tbsp flour to onions, cook another 2 minutes.
Add one cup dry sherry to deglaze.  Cook off alcohol.
Strain off beef broth and add to onions.  Simmer 5-10 minutes
Add fish sauce and soy sauce.
Slice up old bread.  Drizzle with olive oil, salt and pepper, toast.  Rub with garlic.
Add soup to broiler safe bowls.  Put shredded cheese on top of soup, and bread on top of cheese, then more cheese on bread.
Put the bowls onto a baking sheet and put into an oven preheated to broil. Broil for 3-5 minutes until golden brown.

versions.name: Homemade flour tortilla
ingredients: fat - 1/2 cup, lard, shortening or bacon fat
instructions: combine flour, salt and paking powder in bowl.  Whisk together
Add bacon fat and combine into crumbly texture
Add 2/3 cup warm water while stirring to make dough ball.  Leave in bowl, cover with plastic wrap, let it rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
Divide dough into 12-15 portions.  Preheat cast iron pan to medium high heat.
Roll out tortillas thin and put into dry cast iron pan.  Once bubbled, flip.  About 30 seconds per side.  Put tortillas into dry warm kitchen towell

versions.name: Taco 1 - Bacon egg, and cheese
instructions: Bacon - prepare either in cast iron pan or on baking sheet.  Line baking sheet with foil to collect fat.  Toss into cold oven set to 425F, let it sit for 20-30 minutes or until crispy.

Scrambled eggs - Add enough butter to coat bottom of pan and melt.  Add eggs to a bowl and season with salt and pepper.  Add eggs to hot buttered pan.  Start stirring immediately.  Stop at soft scramble.
Add eggs, shredded cheese and bacon to tortilla

versions.name: Taco 2 - Potato, egg, and cheese
instructions: Grate potato into hash.  Wash potato hash to remove starch.  Place potatoes into towell and ring out as much water as possible.  Season heavily with salt and pepper in bowl.
Heat non-stick skillet, coat with plenty of oil and butter and press potatoes into pan.  Cook until crispy (3-5 minutes), flip, cook other side.  Add salt on top.
Add egg to tortilla, cheese and potatoes

versions.name: Taco 3 - Chorizo, egg, cheese, avocado, diced sweet or red onion, cilantro
instructions: Remove chorizo from sausage skin.  cook until crispy.
In separate non-stick, add oil and/or butter until hot.  Fry one egg per taco
Add egg to taco, then chorizo, cheese, sliced avocado, onion and cilantro

versions.name: Taco 4 - Vegetarian Taco - onion, garlic, serrano pepper, avocado, grated cheese, cilantro
instructions: Dice half an onion, cook in oil/butter, add two cloves garlic and one thinly sliced serrano pepper.  Cook until soft
Add one can of black beans, season with salt/pepper.  Cook for a few more minutes.
Add to blender, puree.  Or just use a potato masher.
Assemble taco - Add puree, avocado slice, cheese,

ingredients: 1 bunch Chinese Celery or regular celery is fine
2 chili peppers or 2 jalapeno peppers or 2 bell peppers
instructions: Put meat in freezer for 30 minutes to make it easier to slice
Slice pork into thin strips
Marinate pork with salt, baking soda, soy sauce, chinese cooking wine, corn starch and chili flakes (optional).  Let sit for 20 minutes
Cut Chinese Celery.  Discard all leaves and the root.  Cut the stems into 1.5 inch long pieces
Slice peppers thinly, OK to keep seeds, but discard most of center.  Crush cloves of garlic, but don't chop.  Add all to bowl with celery
heat wok to smoke point, then add oil.
Add pork and quickly stir it around.  High heat, fast action, lots of smoke.  Take meat off wok when done
Add more oil to wok, heat to smoke point, add veggies, add salt while mixing

versions.name: Rice
ingredients: ~2 cups cooked rice is required before starting the rest

versions.name: Stir Fry Veggies
instructions: cut chicken breast into small pieces
Marinate chicken with corn starch, soy sauce, vegetable oil and baking soda.  Set aside for 30 minutes
Chop garlic and vegetables
beat two eggs in a bowl
heat up wok, add 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, wait for smoke
add egg, wait for fluffy then mix and break up, remove egg
Add more oil, add chicken pieces for a couple of minutes
push chicken to side, add garlic then vegetables to center of wok
Give vegetables some time in the midle, then mix it all together, add salt

versions.name: Cooking the Rice
ingredients: 3 Tablespoons soy sauce (1 light 2 dark if you have it)
instructions: Remove everything from wok, add more oil, add cooked rice, break down big pieces and stir, fry for 3-5 minutes
Add soy sauce and mix fast
Add vegetables, meat, and egg, and mix
Add salt and pepper
Add spring onions just before eating

ingredients: 8oz mozarella cubed or grated (full fat preferred)
instructions: Break lasagna into bite-sized pieces
In large high side pan, add de-cased sausage, break up and mash to add color
Remove sausage from pan and add onion, garlic and red pepper flakes.  Toast for about a minute
Add tomatoes, add sausage back in
Add a half cup of water and lasagna sheets and try to mix back in, top with tomato sauce
Cover and reduce heat to medium low.  cook for 20 minutes and stir occassionally
Add parmesan cheese and mozarella cheese and mix
add ricotta cheese to the top and cover to warm and melt cheese
Heat the olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat.
While the oil is heating up, mince the garlic then add to the pot.
Cook the garlic for approximately 2 minutes until toasted.
Add the lentils along with the chicken broth, water, curry powder, black pepper, and salt, then stir to combine.
Crank up the heat and bring to a simmer, then turn the heat down to low.
Cook for 20 minutes or until the lentils reach desired doneness (we prefer them slightly grainy).
Add the heavy cream, stir, and allow to cool slightly.
Garnish with olive oil, pepper, and green onions if you have them.
Drain and save liquid from chickpeas
Combine chickpeas, tahini, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice and 3/4 to 1 cup of liquid from chickpeas and some pepper
(Optional) If using real limes / lemon, add some zest for extra flavor
blend until smooth, taste for additional salt, add more liquid if too thick
(Optional) Top with paprika and olive oil
Mix all ingredients other than sour cream in a pan
Combine sour cream, lime juice and water to make a smooth creamy topping
Preheat oven to 250F
Wash and dry the kale completely dry.  Remove stems
Add 1-2 tsp olive oil and sea salt.  Too much oil prevents kale from crisping.
Cook in oven.  Will take about 15 minutes.  Keep an eye on them to make sure they don't burn.

ingredients: Chicken Thighs, cut into bite sized pieces
sugar, vinegar, cornstarch, baking powder, egg

versions.name: Chicken Thighs
instructions: Make a batter with corn starch (about 1 cup), baking powder (1/2 tsp), salt, add water and whisk in egg to make batter-like consistency.
Coat chicken in batter and semi-deep fry in about 1 inch of oil

versions.name: Finishing
instructions: Drain pineapple juice from can into saucepan, add sugar, vinegar, salt, red food coloring.  Separately combine cornstarch (2Tbsp) and water into slurry, add to sauce to thicken.  Heat sauce to simmer.
Add sauce, green pepper and pineapple to wok.  Don't cook too long, keep vegetables and chicken crispy
Serve with rice

ingredients: 2-4 carrots, enough to fill non-metal jar
instructions: Cut carrot into strips, place into jar
Fill jar 1/3 cup boiling water, 1/2 cup vinegar, put sugar and salt on top. Put on lid and shake

ingredients: Macaroni Noodles, 2 cups, dry whole wheat preferred
ground beef or ground soy, 1/2 pound or 1 1/2 cups
fresh spinach, 1/2 bag to a bag

instructions: Cook macaroni but leave al dente, drain.
In a large pot, saute onions, add garlic, deglaze with water
Add diced tomatoes, rinse out can with water and add to the pot.  Add tomato paste, bouillon cube and spice, bring to a boil.
Add protein, carrots, bell pepper and kidney beans, cook until carrots are soft (~5 minutes)
Add drained macaroni and spinach.  Serve with garnish.

ingredients: Extra vegetables: zuccini, cauliflower, brocolli, tomatoes, peppers
instructions: Saute onions until they're golden, deglaze as need
Add garlic, ginger and chili, saute for a few more minutes then drop heat to medium
Add spices, mix well
Add 2 cups boiling water, boullion cube and lentils, simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occassionally
Dice extra vegetables, add to pot with coconut milk, mix, cook for another 10 minutes with pot uncovered
Serve with rice

ingredients: cheese, grueyere preferred for potatoes, parmesan for top
instructions: Peel potatoes, dice into large chunks, boil until piercable then drain and mash.
Add butter (8 Tbsp) and milk (1/2 cup) to saucepan, heat until butter melted, add to mashed potatoes.  Grate in cheese.  Season with salt and pepper
Add ground beef to dutch oven and brown.  Mash it up w/ potato masher, season w/ salt and pepper.  Dump out ground beef.
Add 1 Tbsp butter to empty dutch oven.  Melt the butter and add diced mushrooms, let them brown.
Add onion, celery, carrot and garlic.  Season with salt and pepper.  Let soften for a few minutes.  Not too long or pie will be too mushy
Add tomato paste, saute for a couple of minutes, deglaze with red wine, add worchestershire sauce, bring to a boil
Preheat oven to 375F
Add thyme and rosemary, reduce until liquid is gone.  Add beef stock and frozen peas.  Once peas are added, ready for caserole dish

Add mixture to casterole dish, pack it in tight and spread it out, add mashed potatoes, spread them on top.  Grate plenty of cheese on top.  Pop into preheated oven for 20 minutes or until top is brown.
Let sit for 20 minutes
Add 2 cups ricotta cheese to food processor.  Process until smooth
Add 3 Tbsp sugar. Pinch of salt
Melt 4oz semi sweet chocolate chips. Add to food processor

ingredients: Flour, bread or regular (almond flour won't work)
instructions: Barely melt butter into big pyrex jug (~30 seconds)
Add sugar, whish with fork
Add egg and a splash of vanilla, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 Tablespoon of baking powder, whisk together
Add liquid to fill to 2 cup line
Add flour, about 1 cup and a half, until consistency like pancakes, fold with liquid

versions.name: Dough
instructions: mix ingredients
Form into a ball, put back in bowl, let it rise on the counter for an hour or two (or let rise in the fridge overnight)
Put some olive oil into a nonstick pan.  Add oregano, basil, salt, chili flakes, coat the bottom of pan
Place dough onto pan, stretch into to edges. Rub olive oil on top.  Let it rise in the pan for ~30 minutes

versions.name: Sauce
ingredients: marjoram, oregano, basil, chili flakes, sugar, black pepper, olive oil
instructions: Mix together

versions.name: Pizza!
ingredients: Shredded Mozzarella.  Low-Moisture Part-Skim is best.  Grate it yourself
instructions: Heat dough in pan on range without any toppings applied until bottom is brown
Add sauce, cheese, toppings
Place under broiler
In a pan over medium heat, heat oil. Add onions and garlic and cook until limp.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking to pieces with the back of a spoon, until lightly browned. Drain excess fat, if any.
Add fish sauce and cook for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and crushed tomatoes.
Add water and bring to a boil. Lower heat, cover and cook for about 10 to 15 minutes or until beef is cooked through.
Add potatoes, carrots, peas, raisins. Cover and continue to simmer for about 3 to 5 minutes or until tender.
Continue to cook until sauce is reduced and thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add water, sugar and yeast to mixing bowl, light mix, add oil, egg and yogurt, whisk together
Lay flour on table, make well in center, pour wet into middle, knead the dough, add more flour if too sticky
Form into ball, place into bowl, cover with towel, leave somewhere warm to rise
Cut dough into eight pieces, roll into flat circles
Heat cast iron, place dough onto dry pan, cook for about one minute, see bubbles form, flip, another minute of heat
Brush with garlic butter and add flaky salt

ingredients: 2 cups of jasmine rice (washed and dried)
1 lb (454g) shrimp (bigger ones are more likely to cook in the same time as the veggies)
salt, pepper, oil and spices (I used garlic powder, onion powder and smoked paprika)
fresh herb for garnish (I used lemon balm but parsley would be good)
1/3 cup pepperoncini peppers or banana peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 425.  Spray 9x13 pan
Place chicken in dish, sprinkle with ranch seasoning and au jus
top with peppers and butter
bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is 165 internal

ingredients: Cover 1 inch over with your milk of choice

instructions: Heat a cast iron skillet
toast your buns
Carmelize onions with salt.  To speed up process, you can add some sugar
Remove onions and get the skillet hot, add burgers and smush them down
Season with salt and pepper
Flip, season again, cook a bit, then add cheese to melt
